outcome: Halden's death was a calculated betrayal intended to enhance surveillance.

events.description: Audio logs from Halden revealing his allegiance to the Technocratic Purists are disclosed, showing his role in planning his demise to reinforce control.
Officials are briefed on Halden's hidden agenda to strengthen surveillance, sparking internal confliction over ethical boundaries.
Leaked recordings alleging Halden's intent to orchestrate his death for increased state control fuel public fears about privacy erosion.
Public fear grows as evidence emerges of Halden’s potential manipulations, leading to protests demanding greater privacy protections and system accountability.
